definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: It is huge deals for Russia Federation.
sentences.chinese: 這對俄聯邦是一筆大生意。

sentences.english: Absorbing foreign funds is a major principle of the Russian Federation's external economic policy.
sentences.chinese: 吸引外資是俄聯邦對外經濟政策的主要方針。

sentences.english: The Russian Federation has the largest number of infections in the region - 860,000.
sentences.chinese: 在該地區，俄聯邦被感染者人數最多，爲86萬。
